thoughts.text: I will use the 'execute_shell_popen' command to move the Rickle whitepaper from the current directory to the workspace directory and convert it to plain text format.
thoughts.reasoning: The 'read_file' command was not able to read the Rickle whitepaper from the plain text file. Therefore, I will use the 'execute_shell_popen' command to move the Rickle whitepaper from the current directory to the workspace directory and convert it to plain text format.
thoughts.plan: - Use the 'execute_shell_popen' command to move the Rickle whitepaper from the current directory to the workspace directory and convert it to plain text format.
thoughts.speak: I will use the 'execute_shell_popen' command to move the Rickle whitepaper from the current directory to the workspace directory and convert it to plain text format.

args.command_line: mv Rickle-Whitepaper.pdf /app/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace && cd /app/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace && pdftotext Rickle-Whitepaper.pdf Rickle-Whitepaper.txt
